translations.translation: that he will then receive repayment of the fullest kind;
And only then will he receive his recompense in full;
and that he shall then be fully recompensed,
and will be fully recompensed for his deeds.
Then he will be fully repaid for it?
Then he will be recompensed with a full and the best recompense.
Then shall he be rewarded for it with the fullest reward-
then he shall be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense,
And afterward he will be repaid for it with fullest payment;
and in the end he will be repaid for it in full;
Thereafter he shall be recompensed therefor with the fullest recompense.
then he will be rewarded for it with the fullest reward;
Then will he be rewarded with a reward complete;
Then he will be recompensed with a full and the best recompense.
then, he shall be recompensed for it in full repayment
Then he will be rewarded for it the fullest reward.
Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense
[53:41] then he will be rewarded for it with the fullest reward, the most perfect [reward] (one may say jazaytuhu sa‘yahu or [jazaytuhu] bi-sa‘yihi [to mean the same thing]),
(And afterward he will be repaid for it with fullest payment) good with good and evil with evil;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { ثُمَّ } بعدما حوسب عليه عموم مساعيه أعماله { يُجْزَاهُ ٱلْجَزَآءَ ٱلأَوْفَىٰ } [النجم: 41] أي: يوفر عليه من الجزاء على مقتضى سعيه في أعمالها، خيراً كان أو شراً
